name: VampireLove
description:
You play a little vampire that did a huge mistake at his last spell, so now you need to escape from a cave and get back together with the love of your live. The game is a mix of a puzzle gmae and a platformer. You need to make smart decisions where to plant the torch, so it helps you, but does not kill you.

It the first time I joined a Game Jam, so i hope you like it :)
